name: Play Time (Anna Salieva)
description:
Play Time (prototype) is a horror-puzzle-platformer currently in development by my team as our graduation project. Play as Lemon, a doll stuck in a toy chest on a mission to find his best friend Orange, a raggedy stuffed animal. Play Time is an ongoing project with a full demo planned to come out at the end of March 2022.

Team Credits:

Anna Salieva - Producer / Character Design / Enemy AI / Programming

Nour Hamade - Lemon Model / Rigging / Camera / Doll Hands

Carlos Gomez - Cages / Camera / Level Integration / Programming

Tyler Pasela - Lighting / Camera / Various Models

Jaydev Patel - UI Prompts / Level Design / Programming

Jake Yamashita - Button Model / Level Design

Peiyi Li - Pause & Settings Menu / Audio Handler

Benjamin Chiaro - Lemon Movement / Climbing Mechanics / Programming

Danny Garcia - Music & Sound Engineer / Robot Model
